name: REQUIREMENTS / REFERENCE: Project Safety Plan, Project Environment Plan
• All site personnel inducted, required SWMS completed and signed, Safety Plan approved
• ERSED controls installed on site, air quality visually monitored for dust etc due to construction activities, Environment Plan approved
• Contact DBYD and complete excavation permit, extent of works set out with survey pegs
• Submit the following as per the Project Specific Specification:
o All security required under the Contract
o Evidence of all insurance required to be effected and maintained
o Work Health and Safety Management Plan
o Traffic and Pedestrian Management Plan
• HOLD POINT: Submission of site compound facilities details including location, arrangements and appearance

• HOLD POINT: Submission of Client accommodation details including location in relation to dust and noise generating activities, layout of compound, internal layout of buildings, furniture provided, security measures, program for its construction
• Submit the following as per WCC 0173:
• Submit the following as per WCC 0173:
o Details of any unexpected finds (HP)
• Submit the following as per WCC 0173:
o Details of any non-conforming items (HP)
8 - Removal or Rectification of Enviro. Issues
• Submit the following as per WCC 0173:
o Invitation to witness completion of removal or rectification of environmental issues (WP)
• Submit the following items as per WCC 0173:
o Noise and vibration control plan
o Flora and fauna control plan
• HOLD POINT: Submit ESCP as detailed in 1102
• HOLD POINT: Submit a survey of embankments
o Initial installation of sediment controls (HP)
o Stockpile protection measures in place (WP)
15 - Site access and exit vehicle decontam.
o Access and exit areas – Decontamination of vehicles (WP)
o Fencing and protection of areas (WP)
o Temporary sediment traps and batter protection (WP)
o Removal of temporary erosion and sedimentation works (WP)
• Submit ITPs two weeks before any work under construction
• Provide verification that all permanent survey marks have been identified
• WITNESS POINT: Obtain approval and transfer permanent surveyor marks clear of operations
• WITNESS POINT: Check the digital design model and notify Client of discrepancies between the model and the drawings
• Submit to owners and occupants of adjoining property written notice of intention to commence work and an outline description of the type and extent of works
QA ENGINEER / SPE / PE SIGN OFF
